content.text:
# Gaumee Film Award for Best Actor

The Gaumee Film Award for Best Actor is given as part of the Gaumee Film Awards for Maldivian Films.
The award was first given in 1995. Here is a list of the award winners and the nominees of the respective award ceremonies.

|-
! Superlative

! Record
|-

| Yoosuf Shafeeu
|style="text-align: center;"| 4

| Yoosuf Shafeeu
|style="text-align: center;"| 10
|-

| Yoosuf Shafeeu
|style="text-align: center;"| 3
|-
| Actor with most consecutive year nominations
| Yoosuf Shafeeu
|style="text-align: center;"| 4
|-
| Actor with most nominations without ever winning
| Mohamed ManikRavee Farooq
|style="text-align: center;"| 2

| Yoosuf Shafeeu (Dhevansoora)
|style="text-align: center;"| 43
|-
| Eldest nominee
| Roanu Hassan Manik (Hulhudhaan)
|style="text-align: center;"| 56
|-
| Youngest winner
| Ali Seezan (Hiiy Edhenee)
|style="text-align: center;"| 24
|-
| Youngest nominee

|style="text-align: center;"| 24
